issue.title: [Python] Zstd IPC test is flaky.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15728](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15728). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Our internal CI system shows flakes on the test at approximately a 2% rate.  By reducing the integer range we can make this much less flaky (zero observed flakes in 5000 runs).
